org.infogrid.comm

Interface MessageEndpointListener<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageEndpointListener, AbstractWaitingEndpoint, ReturnSynchronizerEndpoint, RpcClientEndpoint, WaitForResponseEndpoint

    public interface MessageEndpointListener<T>
    Listener interface for events emitted by a BidirectionalMessageEndpoint. Messages may have been queued up and be transmitted in bulk; thus the List of messages parameter instead of just a single message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disablingError(MessageEndpoint<T> endpoint, java.util.List<T> msg, java.lang.Throwable t)
      Called when an error was severe enough that continuing as a MessageEndPoint makes no sense.
      void messageEnqueued(SendingMessageEndpoint<T> endpoint, T msg)
      Called when an outgoing message has enqueued for sending.
      void messageReceived(ReceivingMessageEndpoint<T> endpoint, java.util.List<T> msgs)
      Called when one or more incoming messages have arrived.
      void messageSendingFailed(SendingMessageEndpoint<T> endpoint, T msg)
      Called when an outgoing message failed to be sent.
      void messageSent(SendingMessageEndpoint<T> endpoint, T msg)
      Called when an outgoing message has been sent.

        msgs - the received messages

        msg - the sent message

                     T msg)

        msg - the outgoing message

      • disablingError

        void disablingError(MessageEndpoint<T> endpoint,
                    java.util.List<T> msg,
                    java.lang.Throwable t)
        Called when an error was severe enough that continuing as a MessageEndPoint makes no sense.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the MessageEndpoint that sent this event
        msg - the status of the outgoing queue
        t - the Throwable indicating the error. This may be null if not available
